<page title>: Allen Bradley 2711P T15C4D1 A PanelView Plus 1500 Color Touch Ethernet Read | eBay
description: Allen-Bradley 2711P-T15C4D1 PanelView Plus 1500 Color Terminal 15 inch, Touch Screen, Standard Communication (Ethernet and RS-232), 64 MB Flash, 64 MB RAM, DC power, Series A
miscellaneous: The PanelView Plus and PanelView Plus CE 700, 1000, 1250, and 1500 terminals use additional modular components allowing for flexible configuration, installation, and upgrades. The field replaceable 6.5, 10.4, 12.1, and 15.1-inch flat-panel color displays come with keypad, analog touch screen, or keypad/touch screen input. To meet more stringent environmental conditions, high-bright, conformal-coated, and marine certified display modules are also available.
specifications: Display Description: Color Active Matrix TFT; Display Size: 15 inch; Resolution: 1024 x 768, 18-bit Color Graphics ; Touch Screen Description: Analog resistive; Communication Ports: Ethernet, RS-232, 2 USB; Input Voltage, DC: 18-32V DC (24V DC nominal).
